wikipedia_page.main: Morten Villiers Warren (born 1967) is a British industrial designer. Warren founded Native Design, a design and innovation company, in 1998 and remains the principal creative and CEO.

response: The design of B&W loudspeaker cabinets has been done by industrial designer Kenneth Grange since 1975. Morten Villiers Warren became manager of design in the late 1990s when designing the new 800 series of speakers.
The "Emphasis Speakers" on the album cover were designed by Morten Villiers Warren for B&W. The orchestra was led by John Bradbury.

Founded in 1997 by industrial designer Morten Villiers Warren, Native expanded its services beyond industrial design and engineering into "digital experience, technology, and strategy". It now offers a full-service innovation practice from research through to technology development and manufacturing for clients across industries including automotive, consumer electronics, telecommunications, computing, biotechnology, FMCG and Internet of things.
